name: where we belong.
description:
This short visual novel focused on the story between 2 souls who unfortunate enough to live in a chaotic timeline, Haru and Hitomi as they discussed about their life, uncertainty of how the future would unfold and what they required in order to continue survive in days to come.

  • 30-35 minutes gameplay. That's it.

we know where it start, but are you sure you know where it ends?
...
i wish there's more but there really is nothing.

to begin with.
